data.name: Don't Get The Virus
data.detailed_description: This is an arcade-style, single-player, game where you jump over and under viruses in order to avoid getting infected. You travel in a stream of wind and want to avoid touching it to not speed up as this makes it harder to get a higher score. The objective is to avoid getting the virus for as long as you can and as a result, you get a higher score.
data.about_the_game: This is an arcade-style, single-player, game where you jump over and under viruses in order to avoid getting infected. You travel in a stream of wind and want to avoid touching it to not speed up as this makes it harder to get a higher score. The objective is to avoid getting the virus for as long as you can and as a result, you get a higher score.
data.short_description: This is an arcade-style, single-player, game where you jump over and under viruses in order to avoid getting infected. The objective is to survive as long as you can and as a result, getting a higher score.
